title: email change
body: I need help changing my email. Its an old one I no longer use anymore and have forgotten the password to. Can riot help me change it without me logging into my email, because I completely forgot the password and security questions

replies.body: Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and once you verify yourself as the account creator, they should be able to help out ^_^
i emailed them yesterday and i still havent gotten a response yet..i just hope it doesnt go to my old email lol
If you contact support and give them all the information you possibly can about when, where and the first champions bought on that account they should be able to get it back for you.
